span.style: font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: small; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman';

div.span: Welcome to our website! Please check back periodically to keep current on important news and information.

span.style: font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: small; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: small; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman';

p.span: We take pride in providing parents, students, faculty and the community with information about the district and school functions.

span.span:
!
Parents can add funds, check balances and monitor their child's school meal purchases from any internet connection.
Users can log in using their e-mail address and password.

span.div: The Akron Central School District is proud to be a Tobacco Free School. The use of tobacco and tobacco products by students, employees, chaperones or visitors shall not be permitted on school property or at any school-sponsored off-campus event or activity. The Akron Central School District recognizes that the use of tobacco products is a health, safety and environmental hazard to people and school facilities and has a comprehensive policy prohibiting its use for the benefit of all.
